00461   void setF0Vec(vector<uint>& newF0Vec, globalsT &kg) {
00462     f0Vec = newF0Vec;
00463     meanF0 = (uint) mean(f0Vec);
00464     kg.f0Dyn=true;
00465     if (kg.copyDB)
00466       dur = newF0Vec.size()*kg.ui;
00467   }
